word:
Do these want a change? Let the change first be developed in them. Who prevents them from becoming complete in Christ? They may advance to the first ranks, but they must not commence their work by tearing somebody else down. Although they do not know it, many are as high as their faculties 


                                    -100- 

will sustain them. If they would show themselves faithful and true in that which is least, the Lord would give them greater things to handle.
